title: [Bug]: After sign-in, window flashes with Teams logo a few time and then get "Sorry, something went wrong, please try again"
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

As indirected in the tittle, adter sign-in I get "Sorry, something went wrong, please try again"

### What package are you using?

snap

### Version

1.12.5

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.Install the snap
2.Start teams-for-linux
3.Sign-in
4.Watch the screen flicker and then get the error message mentioned above
```
